biotools.summary: Network-based analysis web tool for the interpretation and visualization of transcriptional and post-transcriptional regulatory information, designed to identify common regulatory elements in a list of genes. Itmaps these genes to the regulatory network, extracts the corresponding regulatory connections and evaluate each regulator for significant over-representation in the list. Ranked gene lists can also be analysed.

bioschemas.name: RENATO
